raw_comment:
What do you notice?

I notice that the NBA and the WNBA have the highest percentage out of all of them.

What do you wonder?

I wonder why the players percentage is so much higher  then the coaches percentage and why that is that way.

What Impact does this have on your community?

There isn’t much of an impact on my community, because I think there is an equal amount of diversity in our players and coaches.

What’s going on in this graph?

In the graph it is showing that there is more diversity going on in the players then there is in the coaches. There should be an equal mix of diversity between players and coaches.
ace_sentences: The NBA has the highest percentage in the graph.
The WNBA has the highest percentage in the graph.
I wonder why the percentage of players is much higher than the percentage of coaches.
I wonder why this difference exists.
This graph has little impact on my community.
I think that my community has an equal amount of diversity among players and coaches.
The graph shows that players have more diversity than coaches.
There should be an equal mix of diversity among players and coaches.
